text: Erika Remberg (15 February 1932 - 10 November 2017) was an Austrian movie actress. She appeared in 31 movies between 1950 and 1970. She was born in Medan, Indonesia. She was known for her roles in Circus of Horrors (1960), Saturday Night Out (1964), Cave of the Living Dead (1964) and The Lickerish Quartet (1970). Remberg died on 10 November 2017 in Benidorm, Spain at the age of 85. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Category:1932 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Austrian movie actors
title: Erika Remberg
